## CircularDependencyDetector.addDependency() method

Add a dependency relationship

**Signature:**

```typescript
addDependency(from: string, to: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  from | string | The identifier of the component that depends on the other |
|  to | string | The identifier of the component that is depended on |

**Returns:**

void
